options.content: Obol

panels.description: Successful cluster duty percentage by type over the whole time range

targets.expr:
(
            sum(increase(core_tracker_participation_missed_total{duty="attester", peer="cloudy-game", env="$env"}[5m])) by (peer) 
        /
            sum(increase(core_tracker_participation_expected_total{duty="attester", peer="cloudy-game", env="$env"}[5m])) by (peer))

(
            sum(increase(core_tracker_participation_missed_total{duty=~".*proposer", peer="cloudy-game", env="$env"}[5m])) by (peer) 
        /
            sum(increase(core_tracker_participation_expected_total{duty=~".*proposer", peer="cloudy-game", env="$env"}[5m])) by (peer))

(
            sum(increase(core_tracker_participation_missed_total{duty!~"(proposer|attester)", peer="cloudy-game", env="$env"}[5m])) by (peer) 
        /
            sum(increase(core_tracker_participation_expected_total{duty!~"(proposer|attester)", peer="cloudy-game", env="$env"}[5m])) by (peer))

options.content: SSV

targets.expr:
100 * (
          sum by (cluster) (rate(ssv_el_request_duration_seconds_bucket{le="+Inf"}[5m]))
          -
          sum by (cluster) (rate(ssv_el_request_duration_seconds_bucket{le="0.5"}[5m]))
        )
        /
        sum by (cluster) (rate(ssv_el_request_duration_seconds_bucket{le="+Inf"}[5m]))

100 * (
          sum by (cluster) (rate(ssv_cl_request_duration_seconds_bucket{le="+Inf"}[5m]))
          -
          sum by (cluster) (rate(ssv_cl_request_duration_seconds_bucket{le="0.25"}[5m]))
        )
        /
        sum by (cluster) (rate(ssv_cl_request_duration_seconds_bucket{le="+Inf"}[5m]))

options.content: Flow Gateway
Node Exporter

panels.description:
- *Load* - CPU capasity used (load average for last 1 minute divided by CPU cores count)
- *CPU* - CPU usage
- *Memory* - memory usage
- *Filesystem* - filesystem usage
- *Disk read* - maximum among all disks read rate
- *Dist write* - maximum among all disks write rate
- *Net recv* - maximum among all NIC's receive rate
- *Net trans* - maximum among all NIC's transmit rate
- *Net sock* - used network sockets 
- *TCP estab* - TCP established connections
- *TCP tw* - TCP sockets in TIME-WAIT status
